scripts.build: nvm use && rm -rf ./bin; mkdir -p ./bin/views; pkg petio.js --out-path "./bin" && cd frontend && yarn install && REACT_APP_ENV=pkg yarn build && mv build ../bin/views/frontend && cd ../admin/ && yarn install && REACT_APP_ENV=pkg yarn build && mv build ../bin/views/admin && cd .. && zip -r petio.zip ./bin &&  npm run stamp-version && rm -rf ./bin
